headline: b'Inflation and Stocks Are Both Up, and That\xe2\x80\x99s Stirring Some Worries'

headline: b'Instant View-Fed Holds Rates Steady, Confident in Inflation Outlook'
snippet: b"The Federal Reserve held interest rates steady on Wednesday and expressed confidence that a recent rise in inflation to near the U.S. central bank's 2 percent target would be sustained, leaving it on track to raise borrowing costs in June."

headline: b'The Durability of Inflation Derp'

headline: b"In Unexpected Move, S&P Cuts Turkey's Rating Deeper Into 'Junk'"
